channel.title: Text Editors on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Text Editors on Orange Academy

item.title: Introduction to Text Editors
item.description: One of the most important tools a software developer uses is the text editor: where they write their software programs.

item.title: VS Code
item.description: The main purpose of this lesson is to get comfortable with the VS Code editor, including how to configure it, install plugins, and discover more efficient ways of editing files.

item.title: Atom
item.description: Learning Objectives The main purpose of this lesson is to get students comfortable with the Atom editor, including how to configure it, install plugins, and discover faster, more efficient ways of editing files.

item.title: Lab: Test Drive Your Text Editor
item.description: Instructions: Create a directory, text-editor-labs Complete these challenges with minimal use of the mouse or trackpad Eggs and Ham Create a file called eggs-and-ham.
